title: A JSON Schema for the Graviton 2 LoadConfig JSON file format.

id.description: A string value unique to this document.

description.description: A description text describing the service this JSON file is defining.

loadPackage.description: Optional name of the loadPackage this LoadConfig is part of.

dependencies.description: Array of LoadConfigObject IDs this LoadConfigObject depends on in a load context.

connectionName.description: Name of the connection this LoadConfigObject loads its data to.

collectionName.description: Name of the MongoDB collection this LoadConfigObject should load its data into.

sqlFile.description: Name of the MongoDB collection this LoadConfigObject should load its data into.
